mention.text: a police force already struggling with allegations of brutality and racism
an officer investigating a report of a prowler
the seventh shooting death involving Kansas City police officers this year
the officer who shot him ; however
the officer who shot him ; however , other recent incidents of alleged excessive force involved black citizens
officers who stopped him on suspicion of drunken driving
the car of the Rev. William Fountaine
a shooting this spring that left a young black man crippled
a two-year veteran of the force
a tragic chain of events that is regrettable for Mr. Barnes ' family and for this officer
a good husband and a good father
